title: PARTY GAMES
text: Welcome to <highlight>OVEREXPOSED</highlight> Your ultimate online destination for classic party games!!!

title: TRUTH OR DARE
text: <highlight>Truth or Dare</highlight> is a classic game that has been enjoyed for generations. Crank up the fun with wild prompts and tough choices. Either spill your secrets or complete the dare…fail, and a punishment awaits!

title: PARANOIA
text: <highlight>Paranoia</highlight>, a suspense-filled party game where secret questions & bold choices keep everyone on edge. Choose someone for the mystery prompt, and watch them decide if they’ll face a punishment to uncover it or stay paranoid!

title: NEVER HAVE I EVER
text: <highlight>Never Have I Ever</highlight>, a fun twist on the classic game. Never Have I Ever brings classic chaos to the party. Read out a question to the group…if anyone’s guilty, they take a punishment. Throw in the 'put a finger down' rule for extra fun!

title: MOST LIKELY TO
text: <highlight>Most Likely To</highlight> is all about calling out your mates! Read a question or let TTS do it, then the group votes on who’s most likely to fit the prompt…whoever gets picked faces the punishment!
